about: Dedicated and accomplished Software Engineer with over 7 years of experience in the IT industry, specializing in front-end heavy full-stack development using ReactJS, TypeScript, JavaScript, Java and web technologies. Proven track record of leading successful projects, collaborating with cross-functional teams, and delivering high-quality solutions. Passionate about mentoring and contributing to the growth of junior developers.

workNotes: Led front-end development for License & Permits Manager, delivering the product for 14 markets within a short span of time
Developed and maintained a License & Permits Manager Tool used to define user flow for license procurement and renewal across various facilities and products
Utilized React JS, JavaScript, TypeScript, Node.js, Redux, and Saga to build robust and scalable solutions to create an intuitive user interface, enhancing user experience and increasing efficiency

Initiated and implemented the concept of providing the web application as a Progressive Web App (PWA) , enabling a mobile-friendly native-like view that saved development time and significantly increased the product's usability
Collaborated with multiple teams to gather requirements and implement new features, resulting in a more comprehensive and user-friendly application
Mentored and guided junior developers, fostering a culture of continuous learning and growth within the team
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to enhance License & Permits Manager and achieve the desired outcomes
Participated actively in design discussions and conducted code reviews to ensure code quality and consistency
Developed robust, scalable, modular and API-centric infrastructures

Created an intuitive interface for customers to manage volumes, arrays, and visualize hardware status using ReactJS for front-end development and JAVA for back-end, ensuring a seamless full-stack experience
Collaborated with a storage client, delivering custom features to meet specific needs and enhancing the existing application
Partnered with cross-functional teams to minimize project delays and ensure timely delivery
Demonstrated innovation by creating proofs of concept for novel solutions, enhancing product capabilities and customer experience
Spearheaded a project for a leading retail customer, optimizing warehouse operations using application in an Android Scanner gun
Modernized PLSQL Oracle forms to cutting-edge technologies, employing ReactJS, Spring Boot, and Oracle SQL as the tech stack
Led full-stack development efforts, ensuring seamless integration and user-friendly interfaces
Successfully delivered the project, streamlining warehouse management processes and enhancing overall efficiency
